channel.title: Special Attack
channel.description: How do you add special attack to a weapon? i still want to add special attack to my statius warhammer and i still wan tto add the bgs anim and gfx to it (for spec) my statius hammer already have a 'special attack bar' but when i click on it, my player attack the person and spec turn off and not doing it well please help me if you can it would be really apreciated and i will rep++ you

item.title: Special Attack
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

He is using a 317 delta
And deob is short for deobfuscation, which has nothing to do with the client version, that is why I get on people who use the word deob in reference to the client version

Read full topic
